original_text: And ye were now turned, and had done right in my sight, in proclaiming liberty every man to his neighbour; and ye had made a covenant before me in the house which is called by my name:
korean_text: 그러나 너희는 이제 돌이켜 내 눈 앞에 바른 일을 행하여 각기 이웃에게 자유를 선포하되 내 이름으로 일컬음을 받는 집에서 내 앞에서 계약을 맺었거늘

sentences.original_text: and had done right in my sight
and ye had made a covenant before me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 내 앞에서 언약을 세웠으니

sentences.original_text: in the house which is called by my name
